formattedAddress: 501 E 74th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 501 E 74th St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: My teenage daughter and I really enjoyed living at the Rose Modern last year. We loved that it is a smaller building with a more personal and friendly ambience than a large high rise. The building is extremely well maintained, quiet, and the apartments very comfortable. The rooftop is nicely furnished and has lovely views in all directions. Each and every individual on staff was exceptionally professional, helpful, courteous, and kind-​​-​​ they made it a genuine pleasure to be tenants at the Rose Modern. We miss it very much!

originalText.text: 501 East 74th Street is a wonderful building. My husband and I have lived there for a year and we have no complaints. The staff is wonderful and management is very responsive and accommodating. The common areas (gym, playroom, roof deck & party lounge) are clean, modern and contemporary. We have used the roof deck and lounge for private parties and have had great success. The rent is competitive with other comparable luxury apartment buildings in the area. Being on York Avenue allows for a quiet and bright living space. I highly recommend this building.

originalText.text: The building is immaculate with full service ammenities! I love the fitness center in the basement it's very complete and a great size. The roof top deck is also nice and large with great outdoor furniture and two large gas grills for meals or entertaining, The service is a solid 10! The staff are friendly and aim to please and I have never waited long for any repairs or service. Lastly the floor to ceiling windows make the apartments bright, airy and spacious. The modern furnishings and well appointed kitchens and bath make this a wondferful place to live!

text.text: The building is immaculate with full service ammenities! I love the fitness center in the basement it's very complete and a great size. originalText.text: We moved into the Rose Modern almost two years ago and have loved everything about the building. The doormen and porters are so friendly and helpful. They make us feel special every time we come through the door. The apartments are beautiful with "condo" finishes, the gym is squeaky clean, and the rooftop is fabulous. Our Super Bowl party in the first floor lounge was a huge hit! Once you've lived here you will be spoiled- it's not easy to find a rental that checks all the boxes.

text.text: We moved into the Rose Modern almost two years ago and have loved everything about the building. The doormen and porters are so friendly and helpful. They make us feel special every time we come through the door. The apartments are beautiful with "condo" finishes, the gym is squeaky clean, and the rooftop is fabulous. Our Super Bowl party in the first floor lounge was a huge hit! Once you've lived here you will be spoiled- it's not easy to find a rental that checks all the boxes.

originalText.text:
My wife and I lived at the Rose Modern for 2 years and loved our experience in the building.

The staff is attentive, warm and eager to help with absolutely anything - there is an authentic sense that they care about the residents and the building at large.

Finding new construction in Yorkville is very difficult and the open, light-flooded design of the apartment was a rare but extremely welcome find in the neighborhood.

The building facilities are top notch (fireplace in the lobby, fantastic business center - even Peloton in the fitness room!). The emphasis on outdoor space throughout was a big bonus too - the rooftop has incredible brows across the East River.

Building management does a great job fostering a sense of community and we especially appreciated all the family friendly events they hosted (Halloween costume parties, rooftop bbq’s, etc.).

We will always have great memories of living here
